com.sun.voip.client.connector
Interface BridgeConnector

public interface BridgeConnector

Bridge Service Interface These methods provide a way to set up, manage and terminate calls and conferences. Calls are set up by using a socket to the conference Bridge software.

Method Summary
 void addCallToWhisperGroup(String whisperGroup, String callId)

Method Detail

createConference

void createConference(String conferenceId,
                      String name,
                      String quality)
                      throws IOException
Creates a conference abstraction.

Parameters:
conferenceId - the conference id to use
name - the display name of the conference
quality - the audio quality to use
Throws:
IOException

removeConference

void removeConference(String conferenceId)
                      throws IOException
Removes the conference abstraction and disconnects any calls that may be using it.

Parameters:
conferenceId - the conferenceId to remove
Throws:
IOException

createCallControl

CallControl createCallControl(String conferenceId)
Creates a call control object that can be used to place and manipulate an individual call. Note that a CallControl can only be used once. Calling placeCall() more than once will raise an exception.

Parameters:
conferenceId - the conferenceId to create the call in

createCallControl

CallControl createCallControl(String callId,
                              String conferenceId)
Creates a call control object that can be used to place and manipulate an individual call. Note that a CallControl can only be used once. Calling placeCall() more than once will raise an exception.

Parameters:
callId - the callId of the call to create or null to have one automatically generated
conferenceId - the conferenceId to create the call in

getCallControl

CallControl getCallControl(String callId)
Get a call control object for the given call id

Parameters:
callId - the callId of the given call
Returns:
a call control for the given id, or null if none exists

playTreatmentToConference

void playTreatmentToConference(String conferenceId,
                               String treatment)
                               throws IOException
Play an audio file to all calls in a conference.

Parameters:
conferenceId - the conference to play the treatment to
treatment - String identifying path of treatment file.
Throws:
IOException

setAnswerTreatment

void setAnswerTreatment(String conferenceId,
                        String treatment)
                        throws IOException
Play an audio file when someone enters a conference.

Parameters:
conferenceId - the conference to set the answer treatment for
treatment - String identifying path of treatment file.
Throws:
IOException

recordConference

void recordConference(String conferenceId,
                      String recordingFile)
                      throws IOException
Record the audio of a conference. This includes all audio from all calls in the conference. Individual calls can elect not to be recorded when the call is set up.

Parameters:
conferenceId - String conference identifier
recordingFile - String with absolute path of file to contain the recording.
Throws:
IOException

stopRecordingConference

void stopRecordingConference(String conferenceId)
                             throws IOException
Stop recording a conference.

Parameters:
conferenceId - String conference identifier
Throws:
IOException

createWhisperGroup

void createWhisperGroup(String conferenceId,
                        String name)
                        throws IOException
Create a whisper group with the given name

Parameters:
conferenceId - the conference to create the whisper group in
name - the name of the whisper group
Throws:
IOException

createWhisperGroup

void createWhisperGroup(String conferenceId,
                        String name,
                        boolean trans,
                        boolean locked,
                        float conferenceVolume)
                        throws IOException
Create a whisper group with the given name and options

Parameters:
conferenceId - the conference to create the whisper group in
name - the name of the whisper group
trans - if true, the whisper group will be transient, and go away when everyone leaves
locked - if true, clients will not be able to say "whisper=false" on this whisper group
conferenceVolume - the volume level of the main conference heard by the whisper group.
Throws:
IOException

destroyWhisperGroup

void destroyWhisperGroup(String conferenceId,
                         String name)
                         throws IOException
Destroy a whisper group

Parameters:
conferenceId - the conference to remove the whisper group from
name - the name of the whisper group to destroy
Throws:
IOException

addCallToWhisperGroup

                           String callId)
                           throws IOException
Add a call to an existing whisper group

Parameters:
whisperGroup - the name of the whisper group to add the call to
callId - the callId to add to the whisper group
Throws:
IOException

removeCallFromWhisperGroup

void removeCallFromWhisperGroup(String whisperGroup,
                                String callId)
                                throws IOException
Remove a call from a whisper group

Parameters:
whisperGroup - the name of the whisper group to remove the call from
callId - the callId to remove from the whisper group
Throws:
IOException

Disconnect from the bridge and clean up any resources that are in use.
